mapper.select: SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `size`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`colorName` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `colorName` FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` GROUP BY `prodNo` ORDER BY `prodNo` DESC LIMIT 16;

SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `size`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`colorName` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `colorName` FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` GROUP BY `prodNo` ORDER BY `score`,`sold`,`review`,`hit` DESC LIMIT 16;
SELECT * FROM `product` WHERE `prodCate1`=#{cate} GROUP BY `prodNo` order by `score`,`sold`,`review`,`hit` DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `size`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`colorName` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `colorName` FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` WHERE `prodCate1`=#{arg0} GROUP BY `prodNo` ORDER BY `price` ASC `price` DESC `score` DESC `hit` DESC `prodNo` DESC LIMIT #{arg2},20;

SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `size`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`colorName` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `colorName` FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` WHERE `prodCate2`=#{arg0} GROUP BY `prodNo` ORDER BY `price` ASC `price` DESC `score` DESC `hit` DESC `prodNo` DESC LIMIT #{arg2},20;

SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`color` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS `color`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY FIELD (size, 'XS', 'S', 'M', 'L', 'XL', 'FREE') ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS `size`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`colorName` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS `colorName` FROM `product` AS a JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` WHERE a.`prodNo`=#{prodNo};
SELECT COUNT(`prodNo`) FROM `cart` WHERE `prodNo`=#{prodNo} AND `color`=#{color} AND `size`=#{size};
